attributes.action: Display E-road numbers on road and motorway signposts when they exist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UNECE has created a network of E numbered routes throughout Europe to help international freight and drivers plan long journeys. These are already designated in the UK but aren't signposted. In most European nations they are clearly signposted and used on top of the national network, in some cases they are the only road numbers. For example the E30 which starts in Perth, Scotland and goes to the Channel Tunnel, then to Algeciras in Spain, yet is Signposted only in France and Spain. Signing this route would make it easier to find the Channel Tunnel from the north for road users unfamiliar with our motorway network. This would involve the minor addition of 3 characters on signs on a few roads and motorways and help integrate our road network with Continental Europe and the Republic of Ireland.
